name: Spider Madness
description:
This game is made to help people memorize attack patterns in any game with introducing simple attack patterns.

This game is made for One Game A Month #12

This game was made in 2 to 3 hours. With blood, tears and a lot of pain.

There are no SFX or Music because I couldn't do them on my own.

How To Play:

Use "Up Arrow" and "Down Arrow" to move up and down.

Use "Enter" to select.
